snippet: The House unveiled cuts to the budget of the Internal Revenue Service on Tuesday, punishing the agency after it targeted Tea Party and other nonprofit groups seeking tax-exempt status.
abstract: Republican-controlled House unveils cuts to budget of Internal Revenue Service, punishing agency after it targeted Tea Party and other nonprofit groups seeking tax-exempt status.
lead_paragraph: The House unveiled cuts to the budget of the Internal Revenue Service on Tuesday, punishing the agency after it targeted Tea Party and other nonprofit groups seeking tax-exempt status.

headline.main: Republicans Seek to Slash I.R.S. Budget
headline.print_headline: Republicans Seek To Slash I.R.S. Budget
